About

Right now fighting for my life.
Right now struggle with my dream.

Hi there,I'm Tsao Shisong(曹石松)，you can call me Sleeplessy.Yet I'm a senior college student studying in Yanshan University,majored in Geotechnical and Underground Engineering.

As all you can see,I'm not a CS student,but I've finished the CS's undergraduate course.Books I('ve finished) reading are listed in BOOK LIST.

Moreover, I'm also an extracurricular translator.And have translated some OTAKU works totaly by myself.Works translated by me are listed in TRANSLATED WORKS.
